滿 → 空：紅 ← 綠 ← 藍 ← 紅

自訂狀態列的電信業者標籤
請輸入一個新的標籤。 保留空白以恢復到原始標籤。

在亮度控制條附近顯示自動調節亮度開關
從狀態列右邊下拉時自動展開快速設定
在快速設定面板底部顯示編輯圖示
允許應用程式透過偽裝成不同的應用程式繞過安全系統。
透過關閉多餘的像素來節省電池電量
啟用省電模式以節省電量
智慧 Pixels 是一項省電功能。這取決於你要關掉多少像素，你就可以看見電池的續航力有明顯的改進。為了讓使用者有比較好的體驗，我們建議你將停用的像素數量設置為75%，每10分鐘調整一次。

在快速設定顯示媒體播放器。\n需要重新啟動系統界面

Choose the style of your statusbar icons (requires SystemUI restart)
Choose the style of your notification headers icons (requires SystemUI restart)
Show notifications ticker-style in status bar
Ticker is visible only when notification heads-up is not shown. Devices with center notch should hide cutout under User Interface settings or under Developer options.
Show lyric in status bar (need App support)
They really cut corners with this one
Use default statusbar height in Hide
如果設備實際上有圓角，則此選項很有用

選擇您喜歡的指紋圖示
若希望新增自己的圖示，請選擇最左上方的圖示，然後使用 OnePlus 6T FP Customizer 應用程式選擇您喜歡的圖示。
Use custom brightness values instead of screen brightness
Set brightness to use when notifcations are shown
Set brightness to use during ambient display on
Display the number of pending notifications
Display notification when changing alert slider position
Control how the device network and gps should behave when the screen is on/off
Actions executed when the screen is turned off
Network mode will be switched to 2G on screen off
Network mode will be switched to 3G on screen off
GPS based location service will be disabled on screen off
Mobile data will be disabled on screen off
Blocking wakelocks have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss
Blocking alarms have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss.
Lock screen Blur cannot be enabled because your current lock screen wallpaper does not match your home screen one, or your device does not support Blur at all.
Show temp with scale and image
Show temp with image without scale
Touch status bar to toggle visibility
